pr_title: Remove module references from parent POMs.

timeline.bodyText: Have the aggregate-reports been fixed where this is no longer needed?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Aggregate reports runs against the root ./pom.xml file and uses that module list. The parent POM isn't even in the graph directly except by parent references (which don't cause module evaluation).
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText:
Couldn't we just use this goal?
http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-checkstyle-plugin/checkstyle-aggregate-mojo.html
Then do something similar to what we do with the code coverage reports and have a module which runs this goal and does the aggregation?
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText: So we do have that goal configured in the client parent POM, but the configuration isn't allowed to be inherited by children POMs. I think we could allow it to be inherited to resolve the Checkstyle aggregate generation issue.
replies.author: alzimmermsft
